text.div:
conditionRequesterNameSearchParameter

Parameter requester.name:string

Searches for condition based on the Practitioner's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?requester:Practitioner.name={name}

ResourceCondition
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesCondition
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: conditionRequesterNameSearchParameter
description: Searches for condition based on the Practitioner's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?requester:Practitioner.name={name}
